abstract: The Obama administration’s decisions to fine two big British banks draws criticism. | Warren E. Buffett dives back into the acquisition pool. | Dish Network to raise its tender offer for Clearwire. | James Gorman, music promoter.
snippet: The Obama administration’s decisions to fine two big British banks draws criticism. | Warren E. Buffett dives back into the acquisition pool. | Dish Network to raise its tender offer for Clearwire. | James Gorman, music promoter.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration’s decisions to fine two big British banks, HSBC and Standard Chartered, over money laundering instead of pursuing criminal charges drew strong rebuke.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Mark Scott
